title: Welcome to the app!
body: Thanks for joining. We hope you enjoy your experience.

title: List Created
body: Your first list has been created successfully.

title: Pro Tip
body: Tap the bottom right button to create your first list.

title: Update Available
body: A new version of the app is available. Update now for the latest features.

title: Order Placed
body: Your order #12345 has been placed successfully. We'll notify you when it's on the way.

title: Order Received
body: Your order #12345 has been received and is being processed.

title: Order Shipped
body: Your order #12345 has been shipped. Track your order for updates.

title: Order Delivered
body: Your order #12345 has been delivered. We hope you enjoy your purchase!

title: Order Cancelled
body: Your order #12346 has been cancelled. If you have any questions, please contact support.

title: Order Refunded
body: A refund for order #12346 has been processed. The amount will be credited to your account soon.
